title: Covered jar, one of three
description: jar, one of three, inverted pear or baluster shaped; ornamental designs of underglaze blue; two panels with flower sprays between; the white originally covered with an all-over design in gold, but now mostly worn off; center of panel, in overglaze painting shows terra cotta basket of flowers and small separate sprays of flowers; band on shoulder and around lip of conventionalized designs in underglaze blue; fitted covers repeat motifs of body and are surmounted by \'Fu dog\' finials, blue bodies on white legs
creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell in memory of James S. and Sallie M. Bell
